item.title: [PI]Making potions Donator
item.dc:creator: @Dell Dell
item.description:
@Dell wrote:

mista pnut:

It looks as if you made it so if you try to use the potion and you’re not a donator, it will say that message and still drink it. I haven’t did much with potions myself though so I’m not too sure honestly. It’s worth a shot.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI]Making potions Donator
item.dc:creator: @Dell Dell
item.description:
@Dell wrote:

Okay guys, i know how to make items donar only, but i am wondering if this would work, i wanna make all my extreme potions donar only, all of them (1)-(4), so heres one of the codes…

case 15312: if(c.isDonator == 0) c.sendMessage("Wearing arrows has been disabled in this duel!"); } else { extremePotion(itemId,15313,slot,2); break;

Thats what i just came up with from the top of my head, please tell me if im missing anything because i cba to test atm. ++

Read full topic
